trans-unit.source: Lists sequence groups for capacity allocations and their values.

seg-source.mrk: Lists sequence groups for capacity allocations and their values.

target.mrk: 처리능력 할당 및 해당 값에 대한 순서 그룹을 나열합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Capacity Sequence Groups</uicontrol> subscreen lists sequence groups for capacity allocations for the product allocation sequence.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Capacity Sequence Groups</uicontrol> subscreen lists sequence groups for capacity allocations for the product allocation sequence.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>처리능력 순서 그룹</uicontrol> 하위 화면에 제품 할당 순서에 대한 처리능력 할당 순서 그룹이 나열됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use a capacity sequence group as an alternative source of product allocation that is checked after a product availability check has been executed. The confirmation from the preceding product availability check is the request (date and quantity) for the product allocation check against capacity. If the available quantity in a capacity sequence group is insufficient to fulfill a requirement, the available quantity in the next capacity sequence group is also considered. Like sales sequence groups, capacity sequence groups are consumed according to their priority.

seg-source.mrk: You can use a capacity sequence group as an alternative source of product allocation that is checked after a product availability check has been executed.
The confirmation from the preceding product availability check is the request (date and quantity) for the product allocation check against capacity.
If the available quantity in a capacity sequence group is insufficient to fulfill a requirement, the available quantity in the next capacity sequence group is also considered.
Like sales sequence groups, capacity sequence groups are consumed according to their priority.

target.mrk: 제품 가용성 점검 실행 후 확인되는 제품 할당의 대체 소스로 처리능력 순서 그룹을 사용할 수 있습니다.
선행 제품 가용성 점검에서의 확인은 처리능력 대비 제품 할당 점검을 위한 요청(일자 및 수량)입니다.
처리능력 순서 그룹의 가용 수량이 소요량을 충족시키는데 충분하지 않은 경우 다음 처리능력 순서 그룹의 가용 수량 또한 고려됩니다.
판매 순서 그룹과 마찬가지로 처리능력 순서 그룹도 우선순위에 따라 사용됩니다.
